title: mAmava mInAkSI rAjamAtangi
sahitya:
mAmava mInAkSI rAjamAtangi mANikya vallakIpANi madhuravANi varALi vENi


caraNam   sOma sundarEshvara sukha sphUrti rUpiNi shyAmE shankari digvijaya praTApini 
hEma ratnAbharaNa bhUSaNi Isha guruguha hrdAgAriNi kAmitArtha vitaraNa dhOraNi 
kArunyAmrta paripUraNi kAma krOdhadi nivAriNi kadamba kAnana vihAriNi
